At first, I HATED this game. I couldn't figure out movement or the ridiculous aiming system. I felt like a baby seal with brain damage from an ineffective club wielding hunter. Fast forward a few years and a buddy convinces me to give it another go, only this time play with people instead of solo queuing. Bruh, lemme tell you. When you have people to talk to and work with you in this game, the difference is like night and day. 10/10 Highly recommend playing this game.
